info.title: Cinolla Client API
info.description:
Welcome to Cinolla Client API documentation for version 3. Please see below for the available API endpoints and their required parameters and responses.
If you have any questions, please contact [support@cinolla.com](mailto:support@cinolla.com).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: An offset to return a paginated list of results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit on the number of results

parameters.name: dateRangeFilter
parameters.description: Used in conjunction with startDate and endDate to filter bookings.

parameters.name: futureOnly
parameters.description: Filter bookings by future only, based on arrival date being greater than now.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Filter bookings by tag name. See tagsOperator.

parameters.name: tagIds
parameters.description: Filter bookings by tag ID. See tagsOperator.

parameters.name: tagsOperator
parameters.description: Operator for use with tags or tagIds params. If all, bookings must have all given tags. If oneOf, bookings must contain one of the given tags.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Fuzzy match on booking reference, e.g. B-001 will match B-00100, B-00101, B-00102 etc.

get.summary: Get detail for a single Booking

200.description: The detail of a single booking

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: An offset to return a paginated list of results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit on the number of results

get.summary: Get detail for a single Contact

200.description: The detail of a single Contact

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: An offset to return a paginated list of results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit on the number of results

parameters.name: sellOnPortal
parameters.description: Filter items to only those marked for sale on the Booking Portal.

200.description: Returns a collection of Courses (line items of type course).

get.summary: Returns a collection of Course Runs for a given course

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: An offset to return a paginated list of results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit on the number of results

parameters.name: sellOnPortal
parameters.description: Filter items to only those marked for sale on the Booking Portal.

200.description: Returns a collection of Course Runs for a given course

get.summary: Get a collection of Custom Forms

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: An offset to return a paginated list of results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit on the number of results

get.summary: Get a collection of Custom Form Submissions

parameters.name: customFormHash
parameters.description: The hash of a Custom Form

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: An offset to return a paginated list of results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit on the number of results

parameters.name: bookingHash
parameters.description: Filter results by a single booking

200.description: A collection of Custom Form Submissions

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: An offset to return a paginated list of results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit on the number of results

parameters.name: bookingId
parameters.description: Filter invoices based on a specific Booking ID.

parameters.name: dateRangeFilter
parameters.description: Used in conjunction with startDate and endDate to filter Invoices.

get.summary: Get detail for a single Invoice

200.description: The detail of a single Invoice

get.summary: Returns a collection of Line Items.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: An offset to return a paginated list of results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit on the number of results

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by the type of the line item, e.g. course

parameters.name: sellOnPortal
parameters.description: Filter items to only those marked for sale on the Booking Portal.

200.description: Returns a collection of Line Items.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: An offset to return a paginated list of results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit on the number of results

parameters.name: dateRangeFilter
parameters.description: Used in conjunction with startDate and endDate to filter Invoices.

parameters.name: includeRemoved
parameters.description: Whether or not to include entities flagged as removed

outstandingAmount.title: Calculates the outstanding amount left of the invoice
Calculates the outstanding amount left of the invoice

percentage.title: Non-DB value, calculated and set at the time of api response
Non-DB value, calculated and set at the time of api response

outstandingAmount.title: Calculates the outstanding amount left of the invoice

offset.name: offset
offset.description: An offset used to return a paginated list of results

limit.name: limit
limit.description: A limit/max on the number of results returned

startDateRange.name: startDate
startDateRange.description: Start date of a date range. Used in conjunction with endDate to create a date range to filter by.

endDateRange.name: endDate
endDateRange.description: End date of a date range. Used in conjunction with startDate to create a date range to filter by.

xAppliedOffset.description: The offset applied to this request.

xAppliedLimit.description: The limit on the number of results that was applied to this request.

xTotalCount.description: The total number of items for this query, taking into account any filters that may be applied.

xRateLimitLimit.description: The rate limit applicable to the current request.

xRateLimitRemaining.description: The number of requests left for the current rate-limit time window.

xRateLimitReset.description: The time (UTC epoch time in seconds) at which the rate limit resets.
